input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product specifications and product specification below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product specification:
minecraft cube White Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge Screen Cover Case Luxurious and Fashion Design

Product specifications:
Magnetic closure for increased protection
Durable full-frame protection from drops and dings
Vibrant and realistic 3D floral pattern 
Special coating provides a smooth rubber grip
Keep your phone away from scratches, bumps and dust.
input_text.Response A:
Attention: 
Looking for a reliable and durable scope mount for your Mossberg 500, 590, or 835? Look no further than the Tactical Picatinny/weaver Rail Scope Mount 13 Slots! This mount is brand new, unused, and unopened, so you can be sure it's in perfect condition.

Interest: 
The Tactical Picatinny/weaver Rail Scope Mount 13 Slots is designed to fit seamlessly onto your Mossberg 500, 590, or 835, providing a secure and stable platform for your scope. With 13 slots, you'll have plenty of room to adjust your scope to your liking.

Desire: 
The Tactical Picatinny/weaver Rail Scope Mount 13 Slots is made from high-quality materials, so you can be sure it will withstand the toughest conditions. Plus, it's easy to install, so you'll be up and running in no time.

Action: 
Don't wait any longer to get the scope mount you need. Order the Tactical Picatinny/weaver Rail Scope Mount 13 Slots today and take your Mossberg 500, 590, or 835 to the next level!
input_text.Response B: The Minecraft Cube White Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge Screen Cover Case is a durable and stylish case that will keep your phone safe from scratches, bumps, and dust. The vibrant and realistic 3D floral pattern gives the case a luxurious and fashionable design, while the smooth rubber grip provides a comfortable and secure hold. The magnetic closure also increases the protection of your phone, keeping it safe from drops and dings.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

label_annotations.feedback: Both response are good, depending on preference as both covered all the facts of the features. Response A used a copywriting framework while response B did not.
